code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{CartContext}from'../hooks/useCart';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cart=()=>{const{cart,removeFromCart,total}=useContext(CartContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Cart"}),cart.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Quantity: ",item.quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeFromCart(item._id),children:"Remove"})]},item._id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Total: $",total.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Proceed to Checkout"})]});};export default Cart;
